New Records: Giancarlo Stanton moved into fourth place on the club's career list with 16 home runs in the postseason
Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a three-run homer with two outs in the 10th inning

Austin Wells walked with one out in the 10th and Alex Verdugo followed with a grounder to Guardians second baseman Andrés Giménez, whose soft toss to the bag was dropped by rookie shortstop Brayan Rocchio for an error
Hunter Gaddis struck out Gleyber Torres and had Soto in a 1-2 count before New York's stylish outfielder sent a shot over the wall in center
Giancarlo Stanton hit a two-run homer and was named ALCS MVP
The Guardians rallied to win Game 3 on two, two-run homers in their last two at-bats, and the Yankees held on to win Game 4 after blowing a four-run lead
Pre-Game Insights: The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
The manager was asked what makes Stanton so good and complimented his discipline at the plate and his approach, his process, how he studies guys
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said 'We get to play for a world championship. That's pretty sweet.'
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Brian Cashman said 'We're right where we belong.'
Stephen Vogt said 'There's only one team that gets to win the last game of the year, and unfortunately it's not going to be us.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees will try to win their 28th title against either the New York Mets or Los Angeles Dodgers
The club's 82-80, fourth-place finish in the AL East last season led to some'soul searching as an organization' during the winter

The team's core stayed mostly intact, getting Soto in a blockbuster trade on Dec. 7 — New York sent five players to San Diego for the three-time All-Star — accelerated the team returning to title contender
The Yankees are back in the World Series, back where their fans expect them to be every year
Others: The game was a rollercoaster and the Yankees were able to just keep punching back
Soto's heroics in Game 5 may have raised his price and he's expected to get a contract upwards of $600 million
